entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
